wikipedia_page.main: Henry Cecil Sutton (26 September 1868 – 24 May 1936) was an English sailor who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics representing Great Britain. He was a crew member of the British boat Cobweb, which won the gold medal in the 8 metre class.

response: In the 1908 Olympic Games, Cochrane and his brothers-in-law, Henry Sutton and John Rhodes, raced in Cochrane's yacht, Cobweb, that won the 8-metre class.
*Henry Sutton, a pseudonym for American author David R. Slavitt
*Henry Sutton (MP) (died 1416), MP for Warwickshire and Nottinghamshire
